children.value: component is a component that allows you to build a simple swiper.
The number of slides that are visible in one view.
Note: On mobile this is always 1
function() { const swiper = useSwiper({ slidesToShow: 2, slidesToSwipe: 2, loop: true, nextButton: , prevButton: }) return ( ) }
enables prev and next navigation with the component you're returning from the callback.
You can create your own buttons outside of the Swiper and control it externally.
